title: Cloud Infrastructure and AI Intern
description: Developed demo projects using Azure microservices, Go, Python, and AI/ML tools, showcasing adaptability and technical curiosity while gaining hands-on experience with enterprise-grade cloud platforms.
Analyzed and categorized AVS-related incident tickets, identifying automation opportunities that improved efficiency in incident management workflows.
Trained custom AI models on incident data to perform ticket summarization and recommend resolution steps, advancing automation in issue resolution and enhancing operational effectiveness.
Documented processes and actively engaged in technical discussions, streamlining knowledge sharing and fostering collaboration within the AVS Automation team.

title: Real Estate Agent Secretary
description: Coordinated 10+ active property listings and showings, ensuring seamless scheduling and contributing to successful transactions.
Processed mortgage applications using CRM tools, expediting documentation workflows and reinforcing compliance with financial regulations.
Communicated with clients daily to gather paperwork and deliver updates, strengthening trust and client-agent relationships.

title: Private Math Tutor
description: Delivered personalized math instruction tailored to diverse learning styles, driving conceptual mastery and long-term retention across grade levels.
Designed and implemented custom lesson plans, leading to 100% parent-reported academic improvement and increased student engagement.
Managed tutoring schedules independently, adapting teaching strategies to meet curriculum requirements and student goals.
